welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Oisterwijk, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and inviting atmosphere. Get ready to explore and immerse yourself in its beauty. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eindhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Eindhoven Airport, primarily used for budget airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kempen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kempen Airport, handling all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Zoersel Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
